title: Peach and Blueberry Muffins
ingredients: ['375g plain flour', '100g caster sugar', '110g dark brown soft sugar', '1 tablespoon baking powder', '1 pinch salt', '3 eggs', '250ml milk', '110g melted butter', '150g blueberries', '150g peeled and diced fresh peaches', 'Topping', '2 teaspoons caster sugar', '1 teaspoon ground cinnamon', '1/2 teaspoon ground nutmeg', '2 tablespoons melted butter']
